name: 柏松林
objective: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
schedule:
class contents
 Measuring and straight line motion
 Vector Quantities, Two and Three dimensional motion, Newton's Law of motion, Friction, Work, Energy, Mass, Momentum, Rotational Motion, Torque, Gravitation, Simple Harmonic Motion, Transeverse and Longitudinal Waves, First and Second Law of Thermodynamics
scorePolicy:
Class Performance 20% 
Quiz 20% 
Attendance 5%
Midterm 25% 
Final Exam 30%
materials:
Fundamentals of Physics Extended. 8th Edition
by Halliday, Resnick and Walker
